mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKBOARD(SEQ,ID,NAME,TITLE,CONTENT) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ),0)+1 FROM BOOKBOARD),#{id},#{name},#{title},#{content})
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ,TITLE,CONTENT,NAME,REGDATE,CNT FROM SUGGESTBOARD ORDER BY SEQ DESC,REGDATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOKBOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE SEQ =#{seq}
